extendedInfo.description: *** Paper Artist is on SALE - 65% discount for one week only ***Turn your photos into personalized works of art!Fun and simple to use, anyone can be an artist!.Features:â Choose from over 30 original artistic styles to transform your photo.â Modify your existing photos, or use the built-in camera.â Paint with the brush to add a splash of color and other magical effects.â Write with the pen to add a personal message or a fun design.â Add a frame or border for that finishing touch.You won't believe how your precious memory will be transformed into something unique and special.Share your masterpiece on all your favorite social media sites. Everyone will be amazed!SAMSUNG DEVICESThis app is preloaded in some Samsung devices, please do not purchase the app if it is already included on your device.POLICIESIf you are unhappy with the app please contact us we'll try to either fix the problem or give you a full refund.Feel free to contact us if you want to share your feedback or experience.Finally, Paper Artist does not store/collect/send/manage any personal data. All images created with Paper Artist are solely yours and yours only.PERMISSIONSInternet: only required to share your pictures. If you don't share, internet won't be used.

reviews.title: Nice but extremely limited
reviews.comment: I like the set of filters and the user interface but there\'s no way to adjust the filters at all.  No way to change them at all, and there should be.
reviews.author: Gary Lucero

reviews.title: Amazing software. Recommend installing without hesitation.
reviews.comment: Amazing software. Easy and convenient to use. A large number of effects ready to use. I think the addition of zoom will allow more precise work with the software.
reviews.author: doron Federman

reviews.title: Make your pics into paintings
reviews.comment: Excellent app. I use it all the time
reviews.author: Mark Devine

reviews.title: Blew my mind.
reviews.comment: Turns any picture into a collection of works of art that you can tweak to your liking. Stuff of legends born at your fingertips. Buy and lit up the world with colours!
reviews.author: Mitranim Forgo

reviews.title: a few things I\'d like to see
reviews.comment: So far the app seems to do a pretty good job, the filters are pretty nice. However there is no customization for the filters which would be nice to have, as well applying multiple filters to the same image is what makes me give this a lower rating.
reviews.author: David Rose

reviews.title: Cool, Needs Zoom!
reviews.comment: This needs a zoom feature... besides that it is amazing. But not being able to zoom really limits it.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like the app but I don\'t use it much

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I was first introduced to this as a bundle in with my SGS3. Didn\'t come with the SGS4,and I don\'t hesitate buying it!
reviews.author: Goldman Kwezi

reviews.title: A very gd paint app version of Paper Camera
reviews.comment: This App takes advantage of Android\'s graphic layering. You can paint new paintings or load photos from your gallery into Paper Camera type effects, then with a brush or pencil, \'wipe\' away parts of an another layer, some of which have a 3D-like edging. You can produce some really interesting effects.   You can do this with Adobe\'s Sketch Mobile, or other layered paint app, but nothing  pre-loaded, layers or frames. I use a lot of Android paint/photo apps, and Paper Artist is a keeper. Needs zoom, however.

Im not a pencil   artist..but i felt like i was. Thanks again! Fun..kids. adults. Everyone!  Maybe a little text insert overlay
